extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Secure Configuration of SAP Landscape
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure a secure configuration of the SAP landscape to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to SAP Message Server
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the SAP Message Server to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Review SAP Notes 1408081 and 821875
extracted_playbook.description: Review the SAP Notes 1408081 and 821875 for guidance on securing SAP systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Authorized Hosts via ACL Files
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict authorized hosts using ACL files on Gateways (gw/acl_mode and secinfo) and Message Servers (ms/acl_info).

extracted_playbook.title: Review SAP Note 1421005
extracted_playbook.description: Review SAP Note 1421005 for additional security measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Split MS Internal/Public Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Split MS internal/public ports using rdisp/msserv=0 and rdisp/msserv_internal=39NN.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Message Server Internal Port
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to the Message Server internal port (tcp/39NN) to clients or the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Secure Network Communications (SNC)
extracted_playbook.description: Enable Secure Network Communications (SNC) for clients to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan for Exposed SAP Components
extracted_playbook.description: Scan the network for any exposed SAP components that may be vulnerable.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure SAP Components Are Not Exposed to the Internet
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that SAP components are not exposed to the internet to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove or Secure Exposed SAP Components
extracted_playbook.description: Remove or secure any SAP components that are exposed to the internet.
